name: opnsense
description: OPNsense is an open-source firewall and routing platform based on FreeBSD. It includes intrusion detection, VPN, reporting, and a powerful web UI for configuring network-level security.
features: Firewall rules: Create and manage packet filtering rules with detailed logging and traffic shaping capabilities.
VPN support: Configure OpenVPN, IPsec, and WireGuard tunnels for secure remote access and site-to-site connections.
Intrusion detection: Monitor network traffic for malicious activity using Suricata with automatic rule updates.
Traffic shaping: Control bandwidth allocation per application, user, or network segment for QoS management.
Web filtering: Block access to categories of websites or specific domains using integrated proxy and DNS filtering.
High availability: Deploy in failover configurations with CARP for redundant firewall protection.
Reporting tools: Generate traffic reports, security logs, and performance metrics with customizable dashboards.
Plugin system: Extend functionality with community plugins for additional services and integrations.
